original_title: Burp! Pepsi v. Coke in the Ice-Cold War
overview: Burp! Pepsi Vs Coke in the Ice Cold War traces the history of these brands against the backdrop of global politics. The second world war was the perfect vehicle for Coca-Cola distribution (including to the Nazis), with bottling plants on front lines paid for by the US war department.
title: Burp! Pepsi v. Coke in the Ice-Cold War
